title: Pbe?
body: I applied for PBE months ago and still haven't been accepted. I know they only accept a number but I'm in good standings, even got a message saying that in League.

replies.body: We can't expedite applications, and don't have information on how to get accepted beyond the [PBE FAQ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/pbe-faq).  It may just take some time to get your application accepted.  Best of luck!
